name: The Platform Horror Game
description:
Horror game with "The Platform" from Netflix theme...

HOW TO PLAY:

- Find bent-neck mannequin and keep your flashlight on her

- If found bent-neck mannequin : your platform go up to the next level

- If not: your platform go down 1-2 level

- Made to the top of prison! (33 level total)

HINT:

- Sometime bent-neck mannequin disguise as normal mannequin so try to remember all mannequin position and find mannequin with different position when lights out.

- Even you push bent-neck mannequin down it will go back to the same position when lights out.

Recent Updates:

- Improve load level performance.

- Minor bug fixes
